org.ipdr.collector
Class SimpleTemplateNegotiatorFactory

java.lang.Object
  org.ipdr.collector.SimpleTemplateNegotiatorFactory
All Implemented Interfaces:
TemplateNegotiatorFactory
public class SimpleTemplateNegotiatorFactory
extends java.lang.Object
implements TemplateNegotiatorFactory

Factory for SimpleTemplateNegotiator. The object reads template configuration from an XML file of the following format:

<Templates> <Template id="TEMPLATE ID"> <Description>DESCRIPTION</Description> <Fields> <Field keyId="135" fieldUsed="true" keyName="myKey1" keyTypeId="3"></Field> <Field keyId="138" fieldUsed="false" keyName="myKey4" keyTypeId="4"></Field> </Fields> </Template> Each <Template> tag corresponds to a single template. The tag must have an id attribute, which should hold numeric value of the template id. Under the <Template>, tags <Description> and <Fields> are expected to be found. The <Description> holds the verbal description of the template. The <Fields> tag holds enumeration of template fields. Each field is represented by a <Field> tag. Each such tag must have the following attributes:
keyId
Numeric id of the field
fieldUsed
Is the field enabled for output by default
keyName
Name of the field
keyTypeId
Type id of the field
